page.title: 18A COUNTRY VICAR'S LIFE
page.content: The vicar has 5 parishes under his care -{Elston, East Stoke, Sibthorpe, {Syerston}and{Shelton.} He lives in{ {Elston}in a new vicarage built in the grounds of the old one and adjacent to the church. His day starts at 6 am with the delivery of newspapers to surrounding villages for distribution by local people. After an 8 am breakfast he starts his very busy parish work, which may include taking sick communion to parishioners, cutting churchyard grass or writing the monthly parish magazine. Every Wednesday he conducts a service at the local primary school. On average there are about 6 weddings, 6 funerals abd 12 baptisms a year in the 5 parishes. The vicar's other jobs include being padre to the T.A. He is also chairman of the school governors, Village Hall Committee and P.C.C.
